targets.expr: SELECT percentile_cont(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY (properties->>'duration_ms')::float) as p50 FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'api_request' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY (properties->>'duration_ms')::float) as p95 FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'api_request' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY (properties->>'duration_ms')::float) as p99 FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'api_request' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'

SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN event = 'error_occurred' THEN 1 END)::float / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0) * 100) as error_rate FROM analytics_events WHERE event IN ('api_request', 'error_occurred') AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'

SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN event = 'cache_hit' THEN 1 END)::float / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0) * 100) as hit_rate FROM analytics_events WHERE event IN ('cache_hit', 'cache_miss') AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'recommendation_generated' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'

SELECT date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time, percentile_cont(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY (properties->>'duration_ms')::float) as p50, percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY (properties->>'duration_ms')::float) as p95, percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY (properties->>'duration_ms')::float) as p99 FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'api_request' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time, properties->>'endpoint' as endpoint, COUNT(*) as requests FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'api_request' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' GROUP BY time, endpoint ORDER BY time

SELECT properties->>'endpoint' as endpoint, COUNT(*) as requests, ROUND(percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY (properties->>'duration_ms')::float), 2) as p95_ms FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'api_request' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' GROUP BY endpoint ORDER BY p95_ms DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT properties->>'error_type' as error_type, properties->>'endpoint' as endpoint, COUNT(*) as count FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'error_occurred' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' GROUP BY error_type, endpoint ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date_trunc('hour', timestamp) as time, COUNT(*) as requests FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'api_request' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

panels.title: Request Distribution by Hour of Day

targets.expr: SELECT date_trunc('hour', timestamp) as time, EXTRACT(hour FROM timestamp) as hour, COUNT(*) as count FROM analytics_events WHERE event = 'api_request' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY time, hour ORDER BY time
